items.title: Are There Too Many Podcasts?
items.excerpt: In recent years, the number of podcasts has exploded, with seemingly anyone and everyone jumping on the trend, from high-profile comedians and A-list celebrities to local tradespeople, various designers, fledgling journalists and political commentators.
